post:
Dallas, Texas Promo - 30% off recurring on any Dallas KVM plan, stacks with billing cycle discounts.
USE CODE: balls30

Sydney, Australia Promo - 15% off recurring on any Sydney KVM plan, stacks with billing cycle discounts.
USE CODE 15sydney2020

Promo codes are limited to around 10-15 uses.

Notes:
Open a ticket after ordering for Dallas VPS to get an extra CPU core for free. Dallas servers use the HiVelocity network, Sydney servers use the OVH network. All VPS come with a 3 day refund period no questions asked. Dallas servers use Ryzen 3900X or 3950X with ECC memory. Sydney servers use E3-1245v5.
